original_text: And he had thirty sons that rode on thirty ass colts, and they had thirty cities, which are called Havothjair unto this day, which are in the land of Gilead.
korean_text: 그에게 아들 삼십 명이 있어 어린 나귀 삼십을 탔고 성읍 삼십을 가졌는데 그 성읍들은 길르앗 땅에 있고 오늘까지 하봇야일이라 부르더라

sentences.original_text: that rode on thirty ass colts
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 서른 마리의 나귀 새끼를 탔고

sentences.original_text: which are called Havothjair unto this day
which are in the land of Gilead
